description:
Ryo takes the boy king into the woods for weeks for survival training, as a group of female assassins tracks them down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryo no Spartan Kyouiku! Harem Sodachi no Aku Gaki Ouji (Kouhen)
Ryo`s Spartan training! The bratty Prince`s growing harem (Part 2)
リョウのスパルタ教育! ハーレム育ちの悪ガキ王子 (後編)
